name: Create SMSC contacts from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new contact in SMSC. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18IEuil00frdoFWYSY2awBSZCLf7-MPa8DNtBFf8kfUY/edit?usp=sharing).
